roleset.name: write by hand
roleset.note: HANDWRITE-V NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison with write.01. Fits with VN classes lecture-37.11-1, performance-26.7-2-1, say-37.7, scribble-25.2, and transfer_mesg-37.1-1-1-1. Framed by Katie.

roles.note: Other variations on this construction should be handled as in theother verbs-of-communication like "say".The 'beneficiary' might be included within the 'thing written'; "Johnwrote a letter to Mary" can be parsed either as [a letter] [to Mary]or [a letter to Mary]. Follow whatever Treebank says.

example.name: write a book by hand - ow!
example.text: Yasser It followed a traditional manuscript Bible format, leaving spaces for rubrications and illuminations, just as scribes had done when they hand-wrote the Bible.
